Blog.heading: Explore in details

travel.title: Turkish Travel as an Advanced example
travel.content: Experience the magic of modern design implemented with seamless simplicity for amazing customers navigation. The advanced and responsive UI design showcases the contemporary approach to Website Development, with SEO optimization and translation support for Arabic, English, and Turkish languages.
travel.author: VIMA Team

beauty.title: Basic Plan for a Beauty Salon
beauty.content: Elegantly designed landing page showcasing the main advantages of your business including services, pricing and google maps widget. A graceful demonstration of one-page Website development, showcasing responsive design principles. Clean and well-structured design ensures optimization for client conversion.
beauty.author: VIMA Team

premium.title: Premium Website Solution
premium.content: Premium implementation of a comprehensive Web Application with multiple pages handling SEO with metadata and hrefs translation, showcasing Web Development excellence. Featuring modern and responsive design, seamless user experience across all devices, and integrated AI Chatbot capabilities for enhanced navigation and engaging user experience. The chatbot is equipped with personalized data, wrapped in a user-friendly interface and is ready to provide instant answers to user inquiries. Ultimate choise for businesses seeking cutting-edge technology and exceptional user experience.
premium.author: VIMA Team

parsinta.title: Basic Plan for Finnish Auto Service
parsinta.content: A one-page website with a simple and clean web design focused on user-friendliness. The project was completed within 6 hours and delivered to the client the next day after the order, resulting in an extremely positive outcome.
parsinta.author: VIMA Team

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use

acceptance.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using the VIMA Web Solutions platform (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, you should not use our Service.

changes.heading: 2. Changes to Terms
changes.description: VIMA Web Solutions reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any significant changes by posting the new Terms on this page. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

responsibilities.item1: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
responsibilities.item2: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
responsibilities.item3: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
responsibilities.item4: Be at least 13 years old to use our Service

intellectualProperty.heading: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of VIMA Web Solutions and its licensors. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used without prior written permission.

userContent.heading: 5. User Content and Conduct
userContent.description: By submitting content to our Service, you grant VIMA Web Solutions a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and distribute such content.

prohibitedItems.item1: Post content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, or obscene
prohibitedItems.item3: Interfere with or disrupt the Service
prohibitedItems.item4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service

limitationOfLiability.heading: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: VIMA Web Solutions shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to the use of our Service.

termination.heading: 7. Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.

governingLaw.heading: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where VIMA Web Solutions is headquartered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contactInformation.heading: 9. Contact Information
contactInformation.description: For any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: At VIMA Web Solutions, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

informationCollected.heading: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollected.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or communicate with us.

informationUsage.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
informationUsage.description: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations.

dataProtection.heading: 3. Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing.
